SEARCH
Package org.myshelfie.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameController extends Object implements Serializable
This class is the controller of a game. It contains the game logic and state.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    GameController.GameDefinition
    Inner class used to represent a game.
    private class 
    GameController.GameTimerTask
    Timer task used to delete a game a certain amount of time after only one player has been online (with game paused).

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(String gameName, int numPlayerGame, int numGoalCards)
      Constructor for the GameController.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game.
      numPlayerGame - The number of players in the game.
      numGoalCards - The number of common goal cards in the game (depends on rules).

  • Method Details

    • startTimer

      public void startTimer()
      Method used to scheduler the timer.

    • stopTimer

      public void stopTimer()
      Method used to stop and cancel the timer. This is called in setOnlinePlayer(java.lang.String) when a disconnected player reconnects.

    • isTimerRunning

      public boolean isTimerRunning()

    • getNumCommonGoals

      public int getNumCommonGoals()

    • createCommandExecutor

      public void createCommandExecutor()
      Creates a new command executor.

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame() throws IOException, URISyntaxException
      Set up the game and start it by performing the first action, i.e. refilling the board.
      Throws:
      IOException
      URISyntaxException

    • createTokensCommonGoalCard

      private LinkedList<ScoringToken> createTokensCommonGoalCard(String id, int numPlayer)
      Utility method used to create the scoring tokens stack for a common goal card.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the common goal card.
      numPlayer - The number of players in the game.
      Returns:
      List of scoring tokens.

    • endGame

      private void endGame()
      Method used to set the game state to END_GAME.

    • checkEndGameBookShelfFull

      private boolean checkEndGameBookShelfFull()
      Method used to check if the game is ended by looking if any player has completed the bookshelf.
      Returns:
      True if the game is ended, false otherwise.

    • setPlayerOffline

      public void setPlayerOffline(String nickname)
      Set the player with the given nickname offline. If the player is the current player, set the current player to the next online player, and reset the Board if the player had some tiles in hand. If there are no more online players, end the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to set offline

    • setOnlinePlayer

      public void setOnlinePlayer(String nickname)
      Switch the player status to online. If the game was paused it's resumed and the timer is stopped.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to set online.

    • checkPlayersOnline

      private void checkPlayersOnline()
      Utility method that checks the number of online players and starts the timer if there is only one player online. It ends the game if there are no more online players.

    • queueAndExecuteCommand

      public void queueAndExecuteCommand(CommandMessage queuedCommand, UserInputEvent queuedEvent)
      Queue a command to be executed. This will add the command to the command queue in a separate thread and execute it as soon as the executorService is available. The ExecutorService is a single thread executor, so commands will be executed in the order they are queued.
      Parameters:
      queuedCommand - The command to queue
      queuedEvent - The event that triggered the command

    • queueAndExecuteInstruction

      public void queueAndExecuteInstruction(Runnable instruction)
      Make the executor service execute a generic Runnable.
      Parameters:
      instruction - The Runnable (such as a lambda function) to execute

    • executeCommand

      public void executeCommand(CommandMessage command, UserInputEvent t)
      Main method of the execution flow of the GameController. Given a command and the event that triggered it, it creates the corresponding Command object and executes it. Reset the error state if everything went fine, the makes the game state transition to the next state.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to execute
      t - The event that triggered the command

    • nextState

      private void nextState() throws WrongArgumentException
      Method responsible for the transition of the game's state.
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - If the player that will be set as current player is invalid.

    • updateEndTurn

      public void updateEndTurn() throws WrongArgumentException
      Method that checks if the board needs to be refilled and do so if needed.
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - If the tiles bag is empty (should never happen)

    • findWinners

      private void findWinners()
      Setting the winner attribute to true of the players who have the maximum points and are online. Draw is possible

    • checkTokenAchievement

      public void checkTokenAchievement() throws WrongArgumentException
      Method that checks if any player has completed a common goal and gives them the corresponding token.
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method use during game creation to add a player to the list of players.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the player already exists in the game

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String nickname)
      Method use during game creation to remove a player from the list of players.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to remove

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()

    • getNicknames

      public List<String> getNicknames()

      public int getNumPlayerGame()

    • isGameCreated

      public boolean isGameCreated()

    • isGamePlaying

      public boolean isGamePlaying()

      public String getGameName()
